attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-0357

Date: 2007-03-15

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Ian E. Wilson, Librarian and Archivist of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($173,600 - $204,200), effective April 1, 2006.


   Sur recommandation du premier ministre,

Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil fixe le traitement de Ian E. Wilson, Bibliothécaire et archiviste du Canada, conformément à l'annexe ci-jointe, lequel traitement se situe dans l'échelle GC 8 (173 600 $ - 204 200 $), à compter du 1er avril 2006.      


    Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Michel Leullier, Secretary, National Battlefields Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($86,400 - $101,600), effective April 1, 2006.
